Html:
Hi there,

First of all, thanks for creating great application. Currently, I start learning how to use and I found that there is a problem at Updates -> Create a Custom Update -> Custom Update Creator. On the window, there is a panel where you drop an action. As I add many actions, I can't access the lower actions because there is no scroll bars. Could you fix this for me?

I also downloaded the source code and it seems that it doesn't match to the current release. Is it possible if I can download the latest sources?

Thank you,
